Clip.Title: ANGKOR: LAND OF THE GODS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Shed light on one of the most enigmatic, mesmerizing civilizations in the history of mankind. We peel away the myth and legend to uncover the hidden story behind the creation of this ancient city.

Clip.Title: THE EMPEROR'S LOST HARBOUR
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An archeological sensation has been discovered in Istanbul, Turkey. The discovery of the Emperor's Lost Harbour - a lost city that was home to 500,000 in Byzantine times.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Tecumseh forges an alliance with the British in pursuit of his dream of a unified First Nations.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Eat Less, Live Longer, The Sweet Science of Chocolate and Animal Chefs
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Scientists are exploring longevity by discovering ways to make animals live longer through calorie restriction. Meet chocolate makers who'll explain the elaborate engineering and chemistry behind this tasty treat, and also learn why it's good for your health! And, learn what it takes to come up with nutritious and tasty meals to feed thousands of species at diners at aquariums and zoos.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Climate Change: The World At Tipping Point
Clip.EpisodeSummary: What kind of planet will our children inherit? Meet hydrologists, geologists and marine biologists that are discussing the environmental changes that are taking place and get an in-depth look at what's being done to reverse the trend.

Clip.Title: THE ICEBERG PROJECT
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Engineer Georges Mougin will try a revolutionary approach to bringing water to arid regions in need by towing an iceberg from the coast of Canada across the Atlantic before it melts. Towing and utilizing icebergs for freshwater: could the dream become reality?

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rabbi Shifren takes inner city LA high school students surfing for the first time to get them out of their 'world is a ghetto mentality.'

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rev Bill Baldwin fights for peace to prevent escalation of Palestinian-Israeli tensions in the divided city of Hebron.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Trek across the vast plains of China on the cramped but culturally diverse train line.

Clip.Title: AFRICAN DREAM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Many immigrants from Zimbabwe come to South Africa to seek their "African dream." On the other hand, South Africans whose jobs have been taken away are showing violent reactions against these immigrant workers.

Clip.Title: AFRICAN DREAM
Clip.Episode: Power to the People: Africa's Mineral Corridor
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Africa is abundant in natural resources. However, until recently, Africa had just been a provider. Enormous Western capital had taken a major part in reaping most of the huge profits.

Clip.Title: AFRICAN DREAM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rwanda was rocked by the ethnic massacres and environmental devastation in the 1990s. But during the past several years, the country achieved a phenomenal recovery called the "Rwanda miracle" with an average annual economic growth rate of nearly 10%.
